price: [si Anghel Gabriel] na may lakas sa ganang May-ari ng Trono, na mataas sa kalagayan,
arabic: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي ٱلۡعَرۡشِ مَكِينٖ

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhī quwwatin ʿinda dhī al-ʿarshi makīnin
